About Us

The most comfortable and chill place in all Bishkek to stay over. The best place for foreign visitors, students, and workers. You can enjoy staying in a quiet and modern place to live at the most affordable prices. If you are a student or worker then our hostel is the option for you. Since we provide all you need to live in a proper and good atmosphere to live. in addition, we have a variety of facilities for our foreign visitors to have quite great experiences from Bishkek and Kyrgyzstan.
